enum: http://smart.who.int/immunizations/CodeSystem/IMMZDAK#The client has history of severe allergic reactions-59
http://smart.who.int/immunizations/CodeSystem/IMMZDAK#Poliovirus vaccination could be contraindicated. Clinical judgement required-66
ValueSet-IMMZD5DTPolioContraindicationsV.narrative: This schema validates IRI-formatted codes for the IMMZD5DTPolioContraindications ValueSet for Decision Table ValueSet. Each enum value includes the system URI in the format {systemuri}#{code} to match JSON-LD enumeration IRIs. Display values are available at http://smart.who.int/immunizations/ValueSet-IMMZD5DTPolioContraindicationsVS.displays.json. For a complete listing of all ValueSets, see artifacts.html#terminology-value-sets.
